about_the_game:
CrateMage isn't just a puzzle game, its a game obsessed with having you use your crate infused powers to overcome some truly devious puzzles. If you're like me & have a crippling addiction to moving boxes around then this experience will ignite that visceral lust in your brain's burnt out pleasure centers and satiate your crate cravings!

(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻

A small favor...

Wishlist!!!!! (⌐■_■)==ε/̵͇̿​̿/’̿’̿ ̿ ̿̿(╥﹏╥) or don't. ლ(ಠ益ಠ)ლ

No! please do, god I love watching NUMBERS GO UP!! Sharing them on x btw - well twitter because me putting x just looks like I'm putting a kiss & that's like not appropriate - we barely know each other! (ಠ_ಠ)

The Hero!

Meet CRATEMAGE! This madlad can bend boxes to his whim and coerce crates to do his bidding! He's been imprisoned in a crate laden pocket dimension & needs your guiding hand to go absolutely goku on the mysterious warlock whose trapped him down there! He sports a splinter proof robe handed down to him by the GrandMaster CrateMages before him && an unbridled enthusiasm that borders on insanity (just like the GameDev - though caffeine plays a big part in that).

┻━┻ ︵ヽ(`Д´)ﾉ︵﻿ ┻━┻

Features

  • Crates

  • Metal Crates

  • Crates which look slightly different to the aforementioned Crates

  • Stuff that isn't Crates

  • Lava (useful for burning crates - if they gain sentience)

  • Water (useful for washing your Crates)

  • Buttons (essentially a bed for Crates)

  • Doors (the mortal enemy of the Crate)

  • An eternal abyss (God help you if you drop a crate in there because I have not accounted for that eventuality)

The Backstory

You've been cast into a crate laden pocket dimension by an evil warlock! Only thing is, he's made a grave mistake. You're not just any Mage, you're a CRATEMAGE! Using your uncanny affinity & borderline obsession with Crates you can link them together & manipulate them in various ways with your unbridled magical Crate affinity. Journey through the depths of several puzzle filled dungeons to free the others imprisoned there & together you can summon enough magical might to escape & confront your captor! But beware! These dungeons are filled with contraptions & hazards that'll put your puzzling to the test. Seek out hidden trinkets to unlock even more of your magical Crate potential!

┏━┓ ︵ /(^.^/)

Meet the Dev

Hey! I'm Soundy & I'll be your gameDev for this journey. I don't just want you to play this, I wanna hear your thoughts & fix anything you might encounter which I can't pass off as an unintended feature! Join me in my discord where I'll be needing your help on all my future games & where I help people to learn the craft of game development.

(ˆ˚ˆ)/

name: CrateMage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CRATES! PUZZLES! MAGIC!! Bewitch Boxes & Puzzle Puzzles to become the one CrateMage to rule them all as you escape from a Crate infested dungeon filled with all manner of Crate contraptions, Magical Trinkets & LAVA! (No really, there is a lot of lava, like far too much lava).
